name: dependency
description: Represents a dependency of a project / module from a specific library

properties.name: dependent project id
properties.description: Id of the project which this dependency concerns

properties.name: used module id
properties.description: Id of the module the referenced project uses

properties.name: relative lib directory
properties.description:
Path to the directory where library jars will be placed. 
Relative to the project's root path.

properties.name: library file path
properties.description:
Path to the library file matching this dependency. Relative to the project's root path. 
None if not applicable.

properties.name: created
properties.description: Time when this dependency was registered

properties.name: deprecated after
properties.description: Time when this dependency was replaced or removed. None while active.

name: dependency update
description: Represents an event where a project's dependency is updated to a new version.

properties.name: dependency id
properties.description: Id of the dependency this update concerns

properties.name: release id
properties.description: Id of the library release that was to the parent project

properties.name: created
properties.description: Time when this update was made

name: binding
description: Represents a binding between an input directory/file and an output directory/file

properties.name: config id
properties.description: Id of the configuration this binding belongs to

properties.name: source
properties.description: Path to the file or directory that is being deployed. Relative to the input root directory.

properties.name: target
properties.description: Path to the directory or file where the 'source' is copied. Relative to the root output directory.

name: branch
description: Represents a versioned branch of a project

properties.name: project id
properties.description: Id of the project this branch / version is part of

properties.name: name
properties.description: Name of this branch

properties.name: created
properties.description: Time when this branch was introduced

properties.name: deprecated after
properties.description: Time when this branch was removed

properties.name: is default
properties.description: Whether this is the default branch of the associated project

name: deployment
description: Represents an event where a project is deployed

properties.name: branch id
properties.description: Id of the branch that was deployed

properties.name: index
properties.description: Ordered index of this deployment. Relative to other deployments targeting the same branch.

properties.name: created
properties.description: Time when this deployment was made

properties.name: version
properties.description: Deployed project version. None if versioning is not being used.

name: deployment config
description: Represents settings used for deploying a project

properties.name: project id
properties.description: Id of the project which this configuration describes

properties.name: output directory
properties.description: Directory to which all the deployed files / sub-directories will be placed

properties.name: relative input directory
properties.description:
Path relative to this project's root directory which contains all deployed files. 
None if the same as the project root path.

properties.name: created
properties.description: Time when this configuration was added

properties.name: deprecated after
properties.description: Time when this configuration was replaced with another

properties.name: uses build directories
properties.description: Whether this project places deployed files in separate build directories

properties.name: file deletion enabled
properties.description: Whether output files not present in the input directories should be automatically removed

name: doc line link
description: Links a line of text to a document section it appears in

properties.name: section id
properties.description: Id of the doc section linked with this doc line link

properties.name: text id
properties.description: Id of the doc text linked with this doc line link

properties.name: order index
properties.description: 0-based index determining the location where the linked item is placed

name: doc section
description: Represents section within a documentation file

properties.name: header id
properties.description: Id of the header (text) of this section.

properties.name: created
properties.description: Time when this section (version) was added

name: doc text
description: Contains a single piece of line of text which is present in some documentation

properties.name: text
properties.description: Wrapped text contents

properties.name: indentation
properties.description: Level of indentation applicable to this line / text

properties.name: created
properties.description: Time when this text was first introduced

name: module release
description: Represents a published version / build of a versioned module

properties.name: module id
properties.description: Id of the released module

properties.name: version
properties.description: Released version

properties.name: jar name
properties.description: Name of the generated jar file.

properties.name: doc id
properties.description: Id of the documentation of this release. None if there is no documentation specific to this version.

name: placed link
description: Common trait for links which place the referenced item to a specific location within the parent item

properties.name: parent id
properties.description: Id of the element within which the linked item is placed

properties.name: child id
properties.description: Id of the linked / placed element

properties.name: order index
properties.description: 0-based index determining the location where the linked item is placed

name: sub section link
description: Represents a link between two doc sections, assigning one as the subsection of another

properties.name: parent id
properties.description: Id of the parent section, which contains the child section

properties.name: child id
properties.description: Id of the section contained within the parent section

properties.name: order index
properties.description: 0-based index determining the location where the linked item is placed

name: versioned module
description: Represents a library module which may be exported or added as a dependency to another project

properties.name: project id
properties.description: Id of the project this module is part of

properties.name: name
properties.description: Name of this module

properties.name: relative change list path
properties.description: A path relative to the project root directory, which points to this module's Changes.md file

properties.name: relative artifact directory
properties.description: A path relative to the project root directory, which points to the directory where artifact jar files will be exported

properties.name: created
properties.description: Time when this module was introduced

properties.name: deprecated after
properties.description: Time when this module was archived or removed

name: project
description: Represents a project that may be deployed, released or updated

properties.name: name
properties.description: Name of this project

properties.name: root path
properties.description: Path to the directory that contains this project

properties.name: created
properties.description: Time when this project was introduced

properties.name: deprecated after
properties.description: Time whe this project was removed / archived
